description: The African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank) announced a $25m term loan facility for Kensington Oval Management Inc. (KOMI) to upgrade the iconic Kensington Oval Cricket Ground in Barbados. This investment comes ahead of the 2024 Cricket World Cup, scheduled for June 4th to 30th in Bridgetown. The loan, backed by a guarantee from the Barbadian government, […]
title: Afreximbank invests in Barbados’ historic cricket ground ahead of World Cup

description: “A trapped accelerator pedal can cause the vehicle to accelerate unintentionally, increasing the risk of a crash,” the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said in a recall notice about Cybertruck, Tesla’s newest electric vehicle, which hit the market in November 2023. The problem, according to the regulator, originated on production lines with soap. “An […]
title: Tesla recalls nearly 4,000 Cybertrucks due to accelerator pedal problem

description: Rania Al-Mashat, Egypt’s Minister of International Cooperation and Governor at the World Bank Group, participated in a live discussion with the Atlantic Council during the IMF and World Bank Spring Meetings. The discussion focused on Egypt’s economic reform plans and its efforts to navigate a challenging global environment. Al-Mashat acknowledged the widespread impact of global […]
title: Egypt’s Al-Mashat outlines economic reforms amidst global challenges at World Bank Spring Meetings

description: Egyptian Minister of Finance Mohamed Maait met with Ivanna Vladkova Hollar, the International Monetary Fund’s (IMF) Mission Chief for Egypt, on the sidelines of the IMF and World Bank Spring Meetings. The discussions focused on strengthening cooperation within the framework of Egypt’s IMF-backed economic reform program. Maait highlighted Egypt’s improving economic situation following the implementation […]
title: Finance Minister discusses economic progress, continued reforms with IMF Egypt Mission Chief

description: The World Bank Group has unveiled a comprehensive initiative to assist nations in providing high-quality, cost-effective health services to 1.5 billion individuals by the year 2030. This initiative is a segment of a broader international endeavour to ensure a fundamental level of healthcare across all life stages—infancy, childhood, adolescence, and adulthood. Having facilitated health services […]
title: World Bank Group aims to enhance health services for 1.5 billion individuals

description: Egypt has solidified its position as the leading producer of solar and wind energy in the Arab world, according to a recent report by the Global Energy Monitor. The report places Egypt at the top of the index with a production capacity of 3.5 gigawatts, significantly ahead of the United Arab Emirates (2.6 gigawatts), Morocco […]
title: Egypt leads Arab world in solar, wind power generation: SEDA Egypt

description: Egyptian Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly is confident that the country’s exports can reach and surpass $145bn by 2030, compared to around $53bn in 2023. Madbouly emphasized the importance of collaboration between the government and the private sector to achieve this ambitious target. He made these remarks during a press conference following a tour of development […]
title: Egypt’s $145bn export target achievable, can be surpassed: PM

description: New Plan Developments has announced the start of delivering units in the SERRANO Residence, its first project in the heart of the new administrative capital, representing a significant step in the development of the Egyptian real estate market. SERRANO Residence is located in a strategic location close to vital areas within the administrative capital, making […]
title: New Plan begins delivering the SERRANO Residence,its first project in the new administrative capital
